header_text:
There is:
No [B]  service between Prospect Park and Brighton Beach.
Extremely limited [Q] service between Prospect Park and Coney Island-Stillwell Av.
description_text:
What's Happening?
We're removing a fallen tree from the tracks at Sheepshead Bay.

Updates:
Uptown [Q] trains are running via [N] line from Coney Island-Stillwell Av to DeKalb Av.
Some Coney Island-Stillwell Av-bound [Q] trains are rerouted via the [N] line from DeKalb Av to Coney Island-Stillwell Av.

Some Brighton Beach-bound [B] trains are rerouted via the [D] line from DeKalb Av to Coney Island-Stillwell Av.

The last stop on Brighton Beach-bound [B] and Coney Island-Stillwell Av-bound [Q] trains is Prospect Park or Kings Hwy.
Listen to announcements for how your train will operate.

Expect severe delays in both directions.

Alternatives:
For [B] service:
In Brooklyn, take a nearby B49 or B68 bus.
On 6th Ave in Manhattan, take a [D][F][M] train.
Along Central Park West, take a [C] or [1] train.
In The Bronx, take a [D] or [4] train.
For [Q] service:
In Brooklyn, take a nearby B49 or B68 bus.
In Manhattan, consider nearby [6] trains on Lexington Ave.
